hairStyleModal.contentNotAppropriate: Please try again with a different hair style description
hairStyleModal.tooltip_description: Instead of using these ready hair styles, you can also create your own hair style here. Describe the hair style you want with AI and have the model displayed with that hair style!
hairStyleModal.publicHairStyleDescription: Other users can see and use this hair style
hairStyleModal.privateHairStyleDescription: Only appears in your hair style list
